heroSection.title: Your Privacy Matters
heroSection.description: We take your data seriously. Here's how we protect it.

endToEndPrivate.title: End-to-End Private
endToEndPrivate.description: Your messages are encrypted and private between you and your recipients.

noDataSelling.title: No Data Selling
noDataSelling.description: We never sell your personal data to third parties. Ever.

youAreInControl.title: You're In Control
youAreInControl.description: You control your visibility and can delete your data at any time.

item0.title: What Data We Collect
item0.intro: To provide you with the best experience on Secrely, we collect certain information. Here's what we collect:

accountInfo.title: Account Information
items: Username or display name (which can be anonymous)
Email address (for account recovery and notifications)
Password (stored as a hashed value by Supabase)

messageContent.title: Message Content
items: The content of messages you send and receive
Timestamps of when messages are sent
Read receipts

deviceInfo.title: Device Information
items: Device fingerprint (for spam detection and user blocking)
Operating system
App version

usageInfo.title: Usage Information
items: How you interact with the app (features used, time spent)
Error reports
Performance analytics

item1.title: How Your Data Is Used
item1.intro: We use your data for the following purposes:

provideService.title: To Provide Our Service
items: Delivering messages between users
Maintaining your account and preferences
Enabling the anonymous messaging features
Providing customer support

improveService.title: To Improve Our Service
items: Analyzing how users interact with features
Identifying and fixing bugs
Developing new features based on user behavior
Optimizing app performance

keepSafe.title: To Keep You Safe
items: Detecting and preventing abuse or violations of our terms
Identifying and addressing security threats
Complying with legal obligations

communicate.title: To Communicate With You
items: Sending important updates about the service
Notifying you about new features (if you opt in)
Responding to your inquiries

item2.title: Third-Party Services
item2.intro: We partner with trusted third parties to help provide and improve our service. Here are the types of third parties we work with:

supabase.name: Supabase:
supabase.description: For secure data storage and authentication

vercel.name: Vercel:
vercel.description: For server hosting and content delivery

cloudflare.name: Cloudflare:
cloudflare.description: For web performance, security, and to facilitate secure WebSocket connections, enhancing the stability and speed of our real-time features.

vercelAnalytics.name: Vercel Analytics:
vercelAnalytics.description: To monitor website performance, traffic patterns, and overall application health.

cloudflareAnalytics.name: Cloudflare Analytics:
cloudflareAnalytics.description: For insights into network traffic, security threats, and content delivery performance.

supabaseLogsMetrics.name: Supabase Logs & Metrics:
supabaseLogsMetrics.description: To track database performance, API usage, and identify potential issues within our backend services.

spotify.name: Spotify:
spotify.description: To provide embedded music content. When you interact with or view embedded Spotify players on our site, Spotify may collect data according to their privacy policy.

item2.footer: All third parties we work with are bound by strict data protection agreements and are carefully selected to ensure they maintain high privacy standards.

item3.title: Your Rights & Control Options
item3.intro: At Secrely, we believe you should have control over your data. Here are the rights and options available to you:

deleteData.title: Delete Your Data
deleteData.description: You can delete your account and associated data at any time:
steps: Go to Settings > Others > Delete Account
Confirm your choice (this action cannot be undone)
We'll permanently delete your data within 30 days

privacySettings.title: Control Your Privacy Settings
privacySettings.description: Customize who can contact you and manage your preferences for a safer experience:
items: Go to Settings > Privacy to adjust who can send you messages.
In Settings > Privacy, you can also manage your Blocked Users list (which shows users you have blocked from specific chat details).
Manage your Hidden Words list in Settings > Privacy, allowing you to add or remove words that you wish to hide from your messages.
Go to Settings > Preference to manage notification preferences.

additionalRights.title: Additional Rights
additionalRights.description: Depending on your location, you may have additional rights under local laws (such as GDPR or CCPA):
items: Right to correction of inaccurate data
Right to restriction of processing
Right to object to processing
Right to data portability

item4.title: Child Safety & CSAE Protection Policy
item4.intro: At Secrely, we have zero tolerance for child sexual abuse and exploitation (CSAE). We are committed to protecting children and young users on our platform through the following actions:

items.title: Content Moderation:
items.description: We use a combination of automated tools and manual review to detect and remove any content that may involve or promote child exploitation.

items.title: Reporting Tools:
items.description: Users can report messages or accounts suspected of abuse, which are reviewed promptly.

items.title: Immediate Action:
items.description: Accounts found violating our child safety policies are immediately suspended and investigated.

items.title: Law Enforcement Cooperation:
items.description: We fully cooperate with law enforcement and relevant child protection authorities where appropriate.

items.title: User Controls:
items.description: We provide features such as message filters, block/report tools, and privacy settings to help users protect themselves.

item4.contactPrompt: If you encounter suspicious or harmful behavior, please report it immediately to

contactSection.title: Contact for Privacy Inquiries
contactSection.intro: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding your privacy or this policy, we're here to help:

policyUpdates.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdates.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. For significant changes, we will provide a more prominent notice or email notification.

header.title: Need Help? We've Got You.
header.description: Here are answers to the most common questions our users ask. Still curious? Reach out!

whatIsSecrely.title: What is Secrely?
whatIsSecrely.content1: Secrely is the next-gen anonymous messaging app that empowers your connections like never before. Forget basic DMs ‚Äì Secrely provides you with a unique, personal link. Share it anywhere, and let anyone send you secret, anonymous messages directly to your inbox.
whatIsSecrely.content2: But here's where it gets truly interesting: If you're intrigued by an anonymous message, and the sender has enabled replies, you can step into a private, anonymous chat right within the app. This means you can dive deeper into meaningful conversations, explore new connections, or get honest feedback, all while maintaining full control over your identity until you choose to reveal it.

listItem1.text: Get unfiltered thoughts, compliments, or questions via your unique personal link.

listItem2.text: If allowed by the sender, transform intriguing anonymous messages into real-time, private, anonymous conversations.

listItem3.text: Your identity stays secret until you decide to show it.

listItem4.text: Experience deeper interactions, free from the pressures of identity.

whatIsSecrely.content4: It's not just messaging; it's a new way to connect, explore, and express yourself with genuine freedom.

isMyIdentityAnonymous.title: Is my identity anonymous?
isMyIdentityAnonymous.content1: Yes, your identity is automatically anonymous when you send messages on Secrely. Our core design ensures that when you send a message through a user's unique link, your identity is not revealed to the recipient.
isMyIdentityAnonymous.content2: Secrely is built around the principle of anonymity:

listItem1.text: Recipients will not see your name, profile picture, or any personal details.

listItem2.text: The conversation is centered purely on the content, allowing for unfiltered and authentic interactions.

listItem3.text: Our system is engineered to protect your identity from the moment you send a message.

isMyIdentityAnonymous.content3: While we are committed to maintaining your anonymity, we always advise users to be mindful of the information they choose to share within their messages, as no digital system can guarantee absolute foolproof privacy against self-disclosure.

canIControlWhoSendsMessages.title: Can I control who sends me messages?
canIControlWhoSendsMessages.content1: Yes, you have control over who can send you messages and how you manage unwanted communication on Secrely.
canIControlWhoSendsMessages.content2: While you don't set granular pre-approval modes, you can manage your incoming messages effectively:

listItem1.text: You can deactivate your unique Secrely link at any time if you wish to stop receiving any new anonymous messages.

listItem2.text: If you receive messages containing harsh language or anything inappropriate, you can easily report the sender. Once reported, you also have the option to block them, preventing them from sending you any further messages until you choose to unblock them.

canIControlWhoSendsMessages.content3: You can manage your blocked users list in Settings > Privacy. This empowers you to maintain a comfortable and safe experience on Secrely.

canIReplyToMessages.title: Can I reply to messages?
canIReplyToMessages.content1: Yes, you can initiate a two-way conversation on Secrely, provided the sender has enabled the reply option for their anonymous message.

listItem1.text: Not all anonymous messages are designed for immediate replies. If the sender has enabled it, you will see an option to start reply a chat.

listItem2.text: If the reply option is available, you can respond, and the conversation will continue as an anonymous chat, maintaining your privacy.

listItem3.text: Within an ongoing anonymous chat, you have the choice to reveal your identity to the other party at any point, should you feel comfortable doing so.

listItem4.text: You always have the option to choose not to reply and archive the conversation, or block the sender if you do not wish to receive further messages from them.

canIReplyToMessages.content3: This ensures that while you can engage in deeper conversations, the level of interaction is initially set by the sender, giving them control over their anonymous outreach.

howDoIReportAbuse.title: How do I report abuse?
howDoIReportAbuse.content1: We take abuse seriously and have a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, threats, and inappropriate content. To report abuse:
howDoIReportAbuse.step1: Open the conversation with the problematic message
howDoIReportAbuse.step2: Tap the three dots (‚ãÆ) in the top right corner
howDoIReportAbuse.step4: Choose the reason for reporting and provide any additional details
howDoIReportAbuse.content2: Our trust and safety team reviews all reports within 24 hours. You can also block users immediately to prevent further contact.

note.text: Even for anonymous messages, we maintain encrypted records that can be used to identify and ban users who violate our community guidelines. Your safety is our priority.

isThisAvailableOnAndroidIos.title: Is this available on Android/iOS?
isThisAvailableOnAndroidIos.content1: Yes! Secrely is available on both major mobile platforms:

platform1.text: The iOS version for iPhone and iPad is currently under development and will be available on the App Store soon. Stay tuned for updates!

platform2.text: Available on Google Play Store for devices running Android 7.0 or later

isThisAvailableOnAndroidIos.content2: We also have a web version at app.secrely.com that works on most modern browsers, allowing you to access your messages from your computer.

howDoICreateAnAccount.title: How do I create an account?
howDoICreateAnAccount.content1: Creating a Secrely account is quick and easy:
howDoICreateAnAccount.step1: Download the app from the Google Play
howDoICreateAnAccount.step2: Open the app and tap "Sign Up"
howDoICreateAnAccount.step3: Enter your email address for verification
howDoICreateAnAccount.step5: Verify your email with the code we send
howDoICreateAnAccount.content2: That's it! You can start using Secrely immediately after verification. Your account can be as detailed or as minimal as you prefer, depending on how you want to appear to others.

whatMessageTypesDoesSecrelySupport.title: What message types does Secrely support?
whatMessageTypesDoesSecrelySupport.content1: Secrely supports a variety of message types to make your conversations engaging:

subType1.text: Standard text with support for emojis.

subType2.text: Anonymous messages can include embedded music content.

subType1.text: Standard text with support for emojis, enabling fluid dialogue.

note.text: The type of content you can send when initiating an anonymous message (via a link) determines what the recipient receives in their inbox. If an anonymous chat is established, communication within that chat is primarily text-based with emoji support to ensure a focused and private dialogue.

howSecureAreMyMessages.title: How secure are my messages?
howSecureAreMyMessages.content1: Security is a top priority at Secrely. Here's how we protect your messages:

listItem1.text: All messages are encrypted so only you and the recipient can read them

listItem2.text: Messages are securely stored in our database in an encrypted format. This means even if there were unauthorized access to our database, the content of your messages would remain unreadable.

listItem3.text: Messages reported for abuse may be retained temporarily in an encrypted state for review by our trust and safety team, in accordance with our Terms of Use.

securityTip.text: While we implement strong security measures, remember that the recipient of your messages could still share their content through other means. Always be mindful of what you send, even in "secure" conversations.

howSecureAreMyMessages.content2: We are committed to continuously improving our security measures to provide a safe and private messaging environment.

isSecrelyFreeToUse.title: Is Secrely free to use?
isSecrelyFreeToUse.content1: Yes! Secrely offers both free and premium options:

listItem1.text: You can send and receive anonymous messages via links without limit.

listItem2.text: You receive 50 "Stars" daily, which reset every 24 hours.
listItem2.subListItem1: Each message bubble in a chat costs 1 Star.
listItem2.subListItem2: Replying to an anonymous inbox message to create a new chat room costs 5 Stars.

listItem3.text: Once your daily Stars are depleted, you won't be able to start new chat rooms or send further messages in existing chats until the Stars reset the next day.

premiumPlan.title: Secrely Premium
premiumPlan.content: We are actively working on a premium version of Secrely that will offer enhanced features and remove daily Star limitations for an even more seamless communication experience. Stay tuned for updates on its launch!

isSecrelyFreeToUse.content2: We believe privacy should be accessible to everyone, which is why our free plan includes essential features. The upcoming Premium plan will add extra convenience and customization options for those who desire them.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still have questions?
stillHaveQuestions.description: We're here to help! Our support team is ready to answer any questions you might have about Secrely.
